input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, LED S And Tips Ophelia & Co'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5 ft Pre-Lit Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7' Unlit Pink Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Forclover 4-Feet Pre-Lit Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights ALHY-214CM'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Pier 1 Artemis Pre Lit Ashland Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9' Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 8' Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Prelit 650 Warm'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Artificial Slim Douglas Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='CC Christmas Decor 4.5 Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Lights 33368418'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, LED S And Tips Ophelia & Co
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Douglas Fir pre-lit artificial tree with realistic branches, but snow-flocked and slim profile differs from downswept, full bodied design of reference, slightly lower relevancy due to style and brand difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5 ft Pre-Lit Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and height with pre-lit feature but Kingswood Fir is a pencil (slim) style, differing in silhouette and branch type from downswept Douglas Fir; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7' Unlit Pink Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though a Douglas Fir and similar height, unlit construction and unusual pink color reduce relevance; lacks pre-lit feature and likely different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Forclover 4-Feet Pre-Lit Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights ALHY-214CM
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller, slim pre-lit artificial tree but no mention of Douglas Fir or downswept style; different brand and likely simpler branch construction, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Balsam Hill is a different brand; Fraser Fir is a related but different fir species; likely high quality and similar function but different style and construction, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pier 1 Artemis Pre Lit Ashland Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and fir species (Ashland Fir), pre-lit but unclear if downswept or same branch tip tech; moderately low relevancy due to species and brand difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9' Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Larger size and flocked appearance differ significantly; lacks pre-lit mention and brand differs; less relevant despite being fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 8' Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Prelit 650 Warm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit with 650 warm lights is similar in lighting feature, but flocked style and larger height, different brand and unsure about branch construction reduce relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Artificial Slim Douglas Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim Douglas Fir indicates different silhouette than downswept full branches; different brand and no mention of pre-lit or branch tip technology, moderately low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CC Christmas Decor 4.5 Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Lights 33368418
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Downswept Douglas Fir pre-lit tree matches style and branch type closely; smaller size and dual color LED differ from clear lights, so high but not perfect relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Dunhill Fir type as previous Dunhill Fir product; relevant but different from Downswept Douglas Fir product reference.
